intro.title: Full Stack Developer
intro.description: Transforming ideas into scalable, intelligent, and high-quality digital products

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm Lívia Devolder, and I've been turning ideas into code for over 4 years. I'm a full stack developer specialized in building scalable solutions with Node.js, TypeScript, React, and Cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP).



Currently specializing in Software Engineering with AI, I aim to integrate artificial intelligence and automation to create products that solve real problems efficiently.



I value well-structured technical development with attention to user experience and clear communication. I believe great projects are born from listening, collaboration, and solutions designed with empathy.

mba.course: MBA in Software Engineering with AI

brq.title: BRQ Digital Solutions
brq.description: First professional experience developing automotive e-commerce platforms for Renault Group. Quickly evolved from backend TypeScript/NestJS to full-stack with React/Next.js, gaining autonomy to execute tasks independently. Worked on projects for Argentine and Brazilian markets, communicating in Spanish with local stakeholders. Promoted to Junior after 12 months.

brq-junior.title: BRQ Digital Solutions
brq-junior.description: Full-stack development for Renault e-commerce platforms in Brazilian and Argentine markets. Implemented end-to-end features including shopping cart, payment gateway integrations, and online reservation systems. Contributed part-time to My Renault app, collaborating with teams from France and Romania in an international environment.

clearsale.title: ClearSale
clearsale.description: Development of brand protection and cybersecurity solutions using web scraping and AI for large enterprises. Led implementation of visual recognition system with AWS Rekognition, training custom models that automatically prioritized critical threats, significantly increasing security team efficiency. Microservices architecture with distributed processing of high-volume data.

borala-freelance.title: Bora Lá
borala-freelance.description: Complete reconstruction of multi-platform ecosystem for gastronomic experiences marketplace, developing from scratch three integrated applications: mobile PWA for users, platform for establishments, and admin panel. Serverless architecture with Firebase and complete project management from requirements gathering to final delivery.

deal.title: Deal Technologies
deal.description: Full-stack development in consulting projects for B3 and Porto Seguro. At B3, worked on building a carbon credits marketplace connecting capture initiatives with emitting companies. At Porto Seguro, worked on automated automotive insurance pricing system, evolving legacy systems with modern technologies.

brq-2.title: BRQ Digital Solutions
brq-2.description: Full-stack developer responsible for PVX (After-Sales 4.0) at Renault Brazil, a platform that digitized 100% of documentation across the entire national dealership network, reducing paper usage by 40+ tons/year. Sole developer on the team, managing complete development cycle, deployment, and maintenance. Lead innovation initiatives including monthly technical meetings (~30 people) and organizing the sector's first hackathon.

aiAssistants.title: AI Assistants
aiAssistants.description: Development of personalized intelligent assistants to automate customer service, technical support, and business processes with modern API integration.

aiAgents.title: AI Agents
aiAgents.description: Creation of autonomous agents for data analysis, workflow automation, and intelligent real-time decision-making.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Creation of scalable systems, robust REST APIs and complete solutions with Next.js, NestJS, MongoDB and AWS. Ideal for complex applications or cloud integrations.

pwa.title: Scalable PWAs
pwa.description: Progressive applications for web and mobile with Firebase, Next.js and integrated authentication. Perfect for MVPs or lean products.

company.title: Institutional Websites
company.description: Beautiful, lightweight and objective websites for companies, professionals or local businesses, with good performance and basic SEO.

hearing.title: Humanized Service
hearing.description: Empathetic communication, active listening and focus on transforming ideas into personalized digital products. You speak, I translate into code.

automacoes.title: Automation & Web Scraping
automacoes.descriptionShort: Robust web scraping and large-scale automation solutions with complete ETL pipelines. Automated workflows for data extraction and integration using RAG for intelligent processing.

renault.title: Renault Store
renault.descriptionShort: Automotive e-commerce platform for Brazilian and Argentine markets serving entire Renault network. Complete system with shopping cart, payment integration, online reservations and checkout.

borala.title: Bora Lá!
borala.descriptionShort: Gastronomic experiences marketplace with three integrated apps: mobile PWA, establishment platform and admin panel. Serverless architecture with real-time synchronization.

notoria.title: Notória Seguros
notoria.descriptionShort: Institutional website with headless CMS architecture allowing complete customization by non-technical teams. Dynamic management system via WordPress with SSG-optimized performance.

chatbot.title: Dex Assistant
chatbot.descriptionShort: Intelligent multi-channel virtual assistant (Telegram/WhatsApp) for companies customer service automation. RAG architecture with Gemini for contextualized responses based on vectorized knowledge base.

jornada.title: Jornada
jornada.descriptionShort: Tarot study and practice platform applying SOLID principles and design patterns. System with card annotations, photo-based spread capture and automated email reports.

contact.title: Get in Touch!
contact.description: Scan the QR Code to access my LinkedIn
